title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 05 May 2012 - XWiki
content:
00:02 <pgmjsd> has quit  
01:12 <jamie\_\_wiki> has joined #xwiki  
01:12 <jamie\_\_wiki> Hello.. is there a way to delete attachment revisions?  When I click to go to the page that lists the revisions I can't see a way to actually delete a specific version. (xwiki 3.5)  
01:22 <polx> has quit  
05:55 <jvelo> has joined #xwiki  
06:12 <jvelo> has quit  
06:20 <@sdumitriu> jamie\_\_wiki: No, that's not implemented yet  
06:20 <@sdumitriu> But it's a good idea, you could create an issue  
07:02 <Denis> has quit  
07:02 <Denis> has joined #xwiki  
07:10 <polx> has joined #xwiki  
08:09 <npm\_> is now known as <npm>  
08:28 <CIA-74> Sergiu Dumitriu master \* ra444e99 https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/a444e999570b4d060be21746c12043c4bbfd9bb8 / xwiki-platform-core/xwiki-platform-oldcore/src/main/java/com/xpn/xwiki/store/migration/hibernate/R40000XWIKI6990DataMigration.java : XWIKI-7784: Migrating database from 3.1 to 4.0 fails while migrating stats on MySQL 5.1 ...  
08:28 <CIA-74> Sergiu Dumitriu stable-4.0.x \* r1afc141 https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/1afc1414861cf28a5af767f2fe6ab5791a5d7223 / xwiki-platform-core/xwiki-platform-oldcore/src/main/java/com/xpn/xwiki/store/migration/hibernate/R40000XWIKI6990DataMigration.java : XWIKI-7784: Migrating database from 3.1 to 4.0 fails while migrating stats on MySQL 5.1 ...  
08:43 <rrodriguez> has quit  
11:00 <xwiki> has joined #xwiki  
11:01 <xwiki> is now known as <sburjan>  
12:33 <jssol> has joined #xwiki  
13:47 <jvelo> has joined #xwiki  
13:55 <SvenDowideit> has quit  
13:57 <SvenDowideit> has joined #xwiki  
14:36 <jssol> Sorry, I may be daft, doing this at 5:34am, but how do you register on the xwikidevelopment wiki?  
14:38 <@cjd\_> just go to www.xwiki.org and the register button should be in the upper right  
14:38 <@cjd\_> there are no users for "dev.xwiki.org", they are all in the main space (www.xwiki.org)  
14:41 <jssol> ah, apologies, i am daft. didn't realize it was the same account. Thank you so much cjd  
14:42 <@cjd\_> no problem :)  
16:15 <jssol> has quit  
19:59 <jssol> has joined #xwiki  
20:03 <jvelo> has quit  
20:43 <jssol> has quit  
21:31 <jssol> has joined #xwiki  
21:33 <SvenDowideit> has quit  
21:33 <SvenDowideit> has joined #xwiki  
23:58 <cjd\_> has quit
